attributes.action: Establish a rigourous code of rules to govern the financial behaviour of MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These rules to be read to the house at the start of each week. All MP's to sign that they understand and will abide by the rules each week.

Any breach of the rule to be punished by hanging by the neck until dead in a suitable public place. No excuses.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
